p: LC/MS grade isopropanol, methanol, and acetonitrile were purchased from Fluka (Germany). Milli Q water (Millipore Elix 10 model, Darmstadt, Germany) was used for mobile phase preparation. The additives, namely ammonium fluoride, acetic acid, ammonium formate, formic acid, and ammonium acetate, were procured from Fluka (Germany).
